Key Match Events: James Harden bounced back from a rough shooting first half to score 14 points in the third quarter.
Harden continued to sizzle in the fourth quarter, adding eight more points, four coming in the final 1:14 in regulation.
Harden had a chance to win the game for the Clippers but missed a potential game-winning layup as time expired.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game took place at the newly-opened Intuit Dome.
The Clippers were without Kawhi Leonard due to a sore knee.
Others: Harden showed up on the defensive end, hustling and providing help defense when needed.
Harden mostly targeted Tyus Jones, the Sunsâ€™ diminutive point guard.
